short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Decentralized mnemonic(seed) manager. Ensures your digital assets remain securely linked and accessible for life.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
--{ This project is collaborative and open source. }--

-- LINKVAULT: DECENTRALIZED MNEMONIC MANAGER --

LinkVault is the ultimate mnemonic management tool, enabling complete decentralization of recovery phrases, especially designed for crypto wallets.

-- IS IT SAFE ? --
The cryptography behind LinkVault is based on the algorithm used by Bitcoin, plus Argon2, ensuring protection against brute force attacks on MnemoLinks.

-- GETTINGS STARTED WITH LINKVAULT IS EASY --
[Create a Password]-> Start by creating a password in the popup. This can be simple; protect against local extraction.
[Craft Your Master Mnemonic]-> Carefully create your custom Master Mnemonic on the main page. Take advantage of the language selection and word count options to generate the seed that best suits you.
[Link Existing Mnemonics]-> Begin linking your existing mnemonics by using the "+" button.
[Learn Your Master Mnemonic at Your Pace]-> Use the mini-games available within the secure environment of the app to familiarize yourself with your Master Mnemonic.

**Note:** Ensure you're not being watched when accessing your vault.

~~ The app is in beta phase, so please proceed with caution. For now, prefer using test mnemonics (you can generate a random mnemonic by clicking on the language flag) and share your feedback to improve the user experience. ~~

A "dark and light theme toggle button" is available in the corner top-right of the app, it can be used to alternate between "light" and "dark" visual theme for a product closest to your personal preferences.
Is this feature safe?? (Probably yes)
